horoscopes.title: Aries Weekly Horoscope Starting December 28
content: This weekend features the year's first full moon, positioned in Cancer's fourth house. This lunar event suggests the completion of domestic matters. This may include resolving family issues or finalizing property transactions. Its influence could extend over the next six months, providing additional time to address ongoing home and family concerns. Emphasizing resolution, this period may also bring relief from ailments for elderly family members. Additionally, long-planned family gatherings are likely to come to fruition during this full moon phase.

The Sun, and Mars is already in Capricorn, and you were feeling troubled at work for the past, but from this week onwards, the situation will change. Mercury and Venus will move into Capricorn, which will bring a lot of relief to the stressed atmosphere. If your boss is unhappy with your work, then you will get some opportunities to please him, and you should use these opportunities wisely. These planets will bring new opportunities to get a job as well, so you should not forget to browse through job portals as well.

These planets in the tenth house also shows multiple discussions with your managers or you will have interviews and debates. This is also a time to prove your skills at work, so make sure you are properly researched about your work. Mars will aspect the first house, so you will be a bit stressed out, but make sure you are sharing your worries with your trusted people. There will be a lot of responsibilities at work, as well as at home, so you will be very busy too. The transits will only bring temporary results, so you need to check any planets are transiting over your natal planets.

horoscopes.title: Taurus Weekly Horoscope Starting December 28
content: This is a very busy week for Taurus rising, Sun and Moon signs, as the full moon will rise in your third house of multitasking. This is the first full moon of this year, so you will get six months to make some plans for your studies, siblings and networking. The full moon indicates completions, so you will complete some tasks related to your work, especially if you are working in communication related domains like teaching, writing, counselling or IT. The transit full moon also will bring multitude of messages, and that can make you a bit distracted too. You will spend more time with siblings, and friend circles, and it can be online and offline.

During this time, you will be looking for new contacts in the local network, as they can give you some profits. Mars will aspect the twelfth house, so there will be some emotional issues as well, and you must stay away from any kind of scandals. Martian aspect will fall on the fourth house, so there will be some significant event at home. That will be majorly like a real estate deal, renovation or relocation, so there will be a lot of family responsibilities too. Family functions and arguments during this time also will be coming up during this time.

The Sun, Venus, Mars and Mercury will be moving through the ninth house, so you will have foreign collaborations or foreign trip. There will be multiple opportunities for studies in the foreign lands, so if you were trying to get such opportunities, these transits can bring them. Writing and publishing will be one of the major themes of these planetary transits, so if you are looking for a publisher, then you will get that as well. The Sun and Mars are naturally complex planets, so you will have some arguments with your elders as well.

horoscopes.title: Gemini Weekly Horoscope Starting December 28
content: Your financial matters will be highly active, as the full moon will rise in the water sign of Gemini during this week. This is the first full moon of the new year, so you will have to be careful with your financial matters. The full moon indicates endings or culmination, so the financial matters will reach a peak through payments, payouts, bonuses or finalized earnings. If you were trying to get a job offer, then you will get such updates, and there are chances for part time or freelance job as well. You can also expect some family functions at home, but you should consider everyone equally during that event.

Mercury will trine Neptune in Pisces, so your career related matters will be very important during this week. There will be some projects related to creativity, spirituality or service based work. Mercury indicates communication, so there will be public speaking opportunities or the public will notice your work and speech. There will be some discussions regarding career with your managers, but make sure, you don’t give any fake promises, as Neptune is a fake planet. Neptune is the planet for illusions, so you will have some fake job offers, so, you need to cross check whether they are genuine.

There will be a cluster of planets in the eighth house, so your life is going through a transformatory period. The developments will be mostly connected with finances, and commitments. You will be forced to think about taking or giving a loan, but both are very risky, so think twice before you take a decision. There will be progress in the legal and contractual obligations connected to marriage, business and partnerships of any kind. Sudden need of money will come up, so you have to be prepared for that. Please avoid any kind of risky activities otherwise there are chances for injuries as well.

horoscopes.title: Cancer Weekly Horoscope Starting December 28
content: The new year will send full moon to your sign, so this is a very important cosmic event for you as the full moon indicates completions. A situation involving your personal and professional life will reach a peak moment or visible conclusion. There will be a huge spotlight on you and you will have some important announcement about your personal or professional life. The Moon indicates emotions, so, you will be naturally emotional for many reasons. You will get relief from some health issues, especially the issues were on the head or facial area. This full moon will make you rethink about your fashion statement.

Mercury will trine Neptune in your ninth house, so you will surely have some interaction with foreign nationals. It can be online or offline, but make sure you don’t transact any money without knowing whether they are real or fraudsters. Neptune is the planet for illusions, but most of the experiences and promises you get this week during this trine will be fake. This is a golden opportunity for creative writers, as they will get many opportunities to expand their thought and they will get opportunities to get their work published. This is also good transit for those who want to study creative subjects.

Multiple planets will impact your seventh house of relationships, so you will be personally meeting and talking to many people online or offline. The transit Sun and Mars in the seventh house are not very positive, so if you already have a legal issue, you will get a verdict during this week. You will also work hard in getting new contracts and agreements as well. For single Cancer Sun, Moon and rising signs will have the closest opportunities to find a partner, but make sure you don’t enter in a commitment without knowing each other.

horoscopes.title: Leo Weekly Horoscope Starting December 28
content: For Leo Sun, Moon and rising, this week will be a bit silent as the full moon will rise in your twelfth house of isolation and detachment. The Moon indicates emotional, so you will have some emotional issues, which will end in the next six months. The impact of the full moon will last for the next six months, so you will have a long duration of time to find solutions for your issues. You will have dreams which is very intuitive in nature, and they will send some signals about your future. This lunation will bring some updates from the foreign lands, or you will meet people connected to isolated places, prayer and meditation.

The messenger of the zodiac Mercury will trine Neptune in your eighth house, and this is a clear red flag regarding your financial matters. You must slow down during this trine, as there are chances for unwanted expenses, which can be troubling for the full week. Please choose the what to buy or where to spend with the help of an expert. Your in laws, or partner will ask accountability for your expenses, which may not be a pleasant event. Additionally, you should stay away from anything which can physically harm you.

Multiple planets will be moving through your sixth house, which will be another complex aspect of this week. The workplace will be challenging as the projects will be very complex, and there will be a lot of detailing at work. You will look for some support from the colleagues, but it will be good if you stay alone, and be self-reliant. The transit will bring new job opportunities also, so, try to look for the ideal one. The lower abdomen also will be sensitive, so avoid any complex diet. There will be multiple opportunities for attending competitive events too.

horoscopes.title: Virgo Weekly Horoscope Starting December 28
content: The first full moon of the new year will rise in the eleventh house so your group events and friendships will be very important. The impact of the full moon will last for the next six months, so for the next six months, you will be focusing on completing some projects which you were working. The relationship with elder siblings will be very important, as they will complete some formalities in their life regarding their profession. Some of your friends may leave or you will leave a group project, which were not helping you. You can also expect foreign collaborations, and there will be some updates from the foreign lands.

Mercury, the messenger of the zodiac will trine the planet for illusion which is in the seventh house. You have to be very careful with your network circles, as they may not be always truthful to you. You will find new groups to communicate, but make sure you are speaking the truth. This trine will bring team events, parties and business meets and you will meet new people. Neptune is the planet for illusions, so people will give fake promises, so you should cross check whether the people are genuine or not.

The Sun, Mercury, Mars and Venus will impact the fifth house, so you will spend more time with your children and youngsters. There will be a lot of work with your creative skills, and people will notice your creativity. This is a very good transit, and if you work hard you can set up some project, which can give you financial gains. However, please make sure, you don’t invest in high risk ventures, as this transit doesn’t support any huge investments. Single Virgo Sun, Moon and rising natives will have the closest opportunities to find someone special. You will take part in parties or variety entertainment programs.

horoscopes.title: Libra Weekly Horoscope Starting December 28
content: For Libra Sun, Moon and rising, the full moon will rise in the tenth house, so there will be some completions at your work. The full moon indicates completions, and the impact of the full moon will last for the next six months, so the next six months are very important for your career. You will take some crucial decisions regarding your career, like completing a project, then starting a new one. This Moon will turn the spotlight on you, so you will get some attention, but make sure the attention is for the right reasons. Your managers will discuss important matters with you.

Mercury will have a trine to Neptune in Pisces, so you will be again thinking a lot about your workplace. Mercury is the messenger of the zodiac, so you will have a lot of communication at work, but Neptune is the planet for illusion, so there can be some wrong communication at work and you should not be a party to that. Please stay away from all kind of unhealthy communication at work like office politics or taking everything in the personal level. Your lower abdomen also will be very sensitive, so you have to be careful with your diet, otherwise there will stomach issues too.

The Sun, Mars, Mercury and Venus will impact your fourth house of home, so the family matters will be of utmost importance. You will have a lot of responsibilities at home, like taking care of your elders and meeting with your family members. The Sun and Mars in the fourth house are not so good, so you will have to be careful with your family matters as there will be some arguments with the elderly figures. You can also expect real estate deals, renovation, and relocation as well. Altogether, this week is full of responsibilities.

horoscopes.title: Scorpio Weekly Horoscope Starting December 28
content: The first week of the new year will have a full moon in the ninth house, so there will be a pinch of spirituality in your life. This full moon indicates completions, so you will go for a long trip, which you always wanted to go. There will be some updates about long trips or foreign collaborations, and you may also get global ventures. If you had appeared for an exam in the immediate past, the result will come up, and something related to studies, certifications also will come up. If you are a writer, then you will get opportunities to get the work published in the coming six months.

Mercury will trine Neptune in Pisces, which will bring a lot of creative activities, but you will have a tendency to take unnecessary risk. The time is not good to take up any creative venture, so you should wait for some more time to start such ventures. There will be some team events, but there are chances for some arguments in the team meetings. If you are working as a script write or director, you will surely be able to expand your thoughts and your ideas will surely capture the attention of the crowd.

The Sun, Mars, Mercury and Venus will impact the third house. There will be a lot of conversations, meetings, calls and messages, so you will be busy and these messages will lead to concrete outcomes than casual exchanges. You will also plan to buy some electronic devices, or repair something. Travelling short and long distance will be the part of this transit, and it can also be for a vacation. You will have more conversation with your siblings, friends and your neighbouring community as well. There will be multiple tasks, which can make you a bit tired as well.

horoscopes.title: Sagittarius Weekly Horoscope Starting December 28
content: For Sagittarius Sun, Moon and rising signs will find more importance for your money matters as the eighth house will have a full moon. This full moon will bring final outcomes, endings and completions regarding financial transactions. There will be some endings regarding joint ventures, and shared resources, and you may be a bit emotional. Some hidden matters will get revealed, and you will try to clear your part. The impact of the full moon will last for the next six months, so you will find the financial matters will improve in the next six months. You will have a spiritual inclination, so you will be attending some spiritual functions too.

Mercury will trine Neptune in Pisces, so your family matters will be important, as the Neptune is in the fourth house of home and family. There will be a lot of communications at home regarding your personal life and family responsibilities. Neptune is the planet for illusion, so you may have some confusion regarding your family matters, so you need to clarify with your family, otherwise there will be conflicts. You can also expect some real estate deals, but please think twice before you sign a fresh deal.

Multiple planets are moving through the second house, so your speech will be very important. The Sun and Mars in the second house will bring harsh speech, which can cause conflicts at home as well as at work. You should control the obsession over your self-worth, instead you should understand everyone want respect. Being a Sagittarius, Sun, Moon and rising, your foundation is on fire element, so you are naturally an aggressive person. This is a good time for public speech, and studies too. Your presence will be much appreciated in such events, so act with humility and respect towards others. There will be sudden expenses, and you should control that.

horoscopes.title: Capricorn Weekly Horoscope Starting December 28
content: The full moon of the new year will rise in the water sign of Cancer, so your personal and professional life will be very important. The seventh house indicates relationships, so there will be some completions in the relationships. Some of the relations will end in the next six months, and it can be personal or professional. You will be working hard to protect some people or be obsessive about some people, but they may not like it. A relationship will reach a clear conclusion through commitment, or a renegotiation. You will also attend some functions, like parties or business meets.

Mercury will trine Neptune in Pisces, which will impact your third house, and that will make you work hard. You will be highly intuitive and you will be able to talk to people in a predictive manner, and that will surprise people. There will be messages, calls or written communication, and those who work in communication related domain will have multiple projects. Some matters related to siblings, and your network circles also will be discussed during this trine. Some travel plans can get cancelled, but don’t worry, you will be able to plan the next trip very soon.

Multiple planets are moving through your sign, so this is a very important transit especially for Capricorn Sun natives, this is the time for solar return. This is the time for initiations, so there will be some major actions will be coming and you will be the centre of actions. You will try to change your appearance, as you feel the need of change. The Sun is a huge light and when it is in your sign, you will be forced to go through some transformation. New projects, plans, or leadership roles will begin under your control than through others. You will fight for your rights, values and independence.

horoscopes.title: Aquarius Weekly Horoscope Starting December 28
content: The first full moon of this year will rise in your sixth house, so it will bring some completions at work. A project, assignment or a professional task will end, and it can end in the next six months also. The impact of the full moon will last for the next six months, so it can also be like you finishing some projects and starting a new one. You will be working hard to complete these projects with perfection. There are chances for some issues with your coworkers, so make sure you keep a good vibe with everyone around you. Your lower abdomen also needs some support, so your diet is also important.

Mercury will trine Neptune in the second house, so your financial matters will be very important. Neptune indicates illusions, so you will be tempted to follow a financial plan, but Neptune can misguide you, so make sure you cross check such plans with experts. You will also be trying to spend some money, and that will be a bad idea too. During this trine, you will try to learn new things, like upskilling, and that will help you to get better opportunities.

Multiple planets will be moving through the twelfth house, so you will be looking for peace and happiness. Some private events which were running a long time will slowly end during these days. You will go to hospital visit for yourself or for someone else as they have medical needs. Some of the confidential work will produce good results and you will be happy about it. These planets are moving through the twelfth house of sleep, so your sleep can get disturbed. You will also have some dreams, which can make you highly intuitive, which will help you in dealing with the complex issues in your life.

horoscopes.title: Pisces Weekly Horoscope Starting December 28
content: The first full moon of this year will rise in the fifth house, which is a very happy event as the fifth house indicates fun and entertainment. The highlight of this full moon will be reflecting in the relationships as the romantic relation will reach a conclusion. You will complete some creative events, and you may even launch a project, with the support of your friends. The fifth house indicates children, so some of the projects for children will end, and you will start some thing new as well. You will also go for social gatherings like parties or business meets.

Mercury will trine Neptune in Pisces, so your personal life will be going through a transformation, and you will have to be careful as Neptune is the planet for illusions. You may misunderstand others and others can also do the same with you, so make sure you confirm everything for clarity. You will be working hard for improving your appearance and health some minor issues can come up, but they will not last longer, and you will get rid of that fast. This is a confusing transit, so you should cross check everything before you sign any document.

Multiple planets are moving through the eleventh house, so your team settings will be very important. There will be group projects, collaborations, and team ventures, which can be bring progress. This is a time for team meetings, so you can expect a lot of activities with friends and team mates online or offline. You will get new connections and they will give you new ideas which can be very good for your future. There will be foreign collaborations or foreign travels, which will surely bring happiness in your life. The Sun and Mars are here, so you can expect some arguments within the team as well.
